element.definition: NFDI4Health Logical Model Core Metadataschema

Group of items providing information about a resource. Resources can be, for example, files or parts of them (e.g. datasets or study documents such as study protocols or questionnaires) or also studies or substudies.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.definition: Unique identifier of the resource used for identification within the NFDI4Health.
element.comment: Additional information: The identifier is assigned automatically. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health, DataCite [1]

element.definition: Group of items providing information about the classification of the resource within the predefined categories.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.definition: A term describing the resource.
element.comment: Additional information: The selected resource type determines which information will be asked next. / Short Input Help: You can register a study, a study protocol, a questionnaire, etc. Please only add follow up questionnaires if baseline questionnaires have already been registered. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1]

element.short: In what form is the [RESOURCE] available?
element.definition: Specific information about the form in which the [RESOURCE] is available.
element.comment: Cardinality: 1..1, if Resource.classification.type != ('Study' OR 'Substudy' OR 'Dataset' OR 'Registry' OR 'Secondary data source'); otherwise 0..0 / Additional Information: If the [RESOURCE] consists primarily of words for reading and is not covered by another textual resource type in this list, 'Text' should be used instead of 'Other'. / Short Input Help: You can select 'Text' for most of the study documents, e.g. for questionnaires, informed consent forms, case report forms, etc.  / Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1]

element.definition: Group of items providing information about title(s)/name(s) of the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.definition: Scientific unabbreviated title or name of the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Additional information: If no official title/name has been defined yet, a title/name that is suitable for public display should be used. / Short Input Help: Please provide at least one title/name of the [RESOURCE]. If the original title is not in English, please also provide an English translation of the original title. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health, DataCite [1], CT.gov [2], DRKS [3]

element.definition: Language in which the title/name is provided.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health, DataCite [1], CT.gov [2], DRKS [3]

element.definition: Group of items providing information about acronym(s) of the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.definition: If existing, acronym(s) of the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Additional Information: The field refers primarily to resources which have an acronym. / Short Input Help: If no acronym exists, you can provide a short title, preferably up to 5 words, e.g. 'NAKO-COVID Questionnaire'. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: CT.gov [2], DRKS [3]

element.definition: Language in which the acronym is provided.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: CT.gov [2], DRKS [3]

element.definition: Group of items providing information about the description(s) of the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.definition: Short plain text summary of the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Short Input Help: Please provide a description in the original language of the [RESOURCE]. If the original language is not English, please also provide a full English translation of the description. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health, DataCite [1], CT.gov [2], DRKS [3]

element.definition: Language in which the description text is provided.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health, DataCite [1], CT.gov [2], DRKS [3]

element.definition: Group of items providing information about keywords describing the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Additional Information: The findability of the [RESOURCE] can be significantly increased if proper keywords are stated. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.definition: Keyword(s) describing the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Additional Information: The use of terms from established classifications/vocabularies (e.g. SNOMED CT, MeSH, UMLS) is preferred. However, also self-assigned keywords are allowed. / Short Input Help: Preferably, use terms from SNOMED CT or MESH. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1], CT.gov [2], DRKS [3]

element.definition: If known, the code of the keyword in the classification/vocabulary used.
element.comment: Short Input Help: If known, you can provide the code of the keyword in the classification/vocabulary used. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1], CT.gov [2], DRKS [3]

element.definition: Language(s) in which the [RESOURCE] is conducted/provided.
element.comment: Short Input Help: Select all that apply. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1]

element.definition: If existing, a link to the web page directly relevant to the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Additional Information: Other web pages related to the [RESOURCE] can additionally be entered in the section 'Related resources'. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1], CT.gov [2], DRKS [3]

element.definition: Group of items applicable only to resource types other than a study/substudy, a dataset, a registry, or a secondary data source.
element.comment: Cardinality: 1..1, if Resource.classification.type != ('Study' OR 'Substudy' OR 'Registry' OR 'Secondary data source'); otherwise 0..0 / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.definition: If applicable, the version number of the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1]

element.definition: If applicable, the file format of the [RESOURCE] (e.g., XML, PDF, XLSX, etc.).
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1]

element.definition: Group of items providing information about the rights to (re-)use the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.definition: License defining the rights to (re-)use the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Short Input Help: Select one value from the list. If 'Other' is selected, please provide an explanation of the (re-)use terms and conditions in the field 'Additional information about use rights'. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health, DataCite [1]

element.definition: Link to the selected license.
element.comment: Cardinality: 0..1, if Resource.nonStudyDetails.useRights.label == 'Other'; otherwise 0..0 / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health, DataCite [1]

element.definition: Group of items applicable only if a Creative Commons license is selected.
element.comment: Cardinality: 1..1, if Resource.nonStudyDetails.useRights.label != ('CC0 1.0 (Creative Commons Zero v1.0 Universal') OR 'All rights reserved' OR 'Other' OR 'Not applicable' OR 'Unknown'); otherwise 0..0 / Additional Information: In order to successfully publish the [RESOURCE] under the respective license, all four questions ought to be confirmed. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.short: Do you confirm that the authors of the [RESOURCE] have authority to license it?
element.definition: Confirmation that the authors of the [RESOURCE] have authority to license it.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.short: Do you confirm that the authors of the [RESOURCE] have read and understood the terms of the chosen license?
element.definition: Confirmation that the authors of the [RESOURCE] have read and understood the terms of the chosen license.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.short: Do you confirm that the authors of the [RESOURCE] understand that Creative Commons (CC) licensing is irrevocable?
element.definition: Confirmation that the authors of the [RESOURCE] understand that Creative Commons (CC) licensing is not revocable.
element.comment: Additional Information: The [RESOURCE] can be licensed using a CC-license only if it is free of the third-party rights. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.short: Do you confirm that the authors of the [RESOURCE] allow NFDI4Health to license the document?
element.definition: Confirmation that NFDI4Health is allowed to license the document, i.e. to mark the [RESOURCE] with the license information.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.definition: Any additional descriptive information explaining terms and conditions to (re-)use the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Additional Information: If 'Other' is selected in the field 'License', the preferred license or terms and conditions for (re-)use should be specified here. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health, DataCite [1]

element.definition: Group of items providing information about person(s), group(s) of persons or institution(s)/organisation(s)
element.comment: Additional Information: For each [RESOURCE], there may be multiple contributors, but at least one person, group of persons or institution/organisation must be specified. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.short: Is it a personal or organisational contribution?
element.definition: Indication whether the contribution was made by person(s) or organisation(s)/institution(s)/group(s).
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health, DataCite [1]

element.definition: Group of items providing information about group(s) of persons, institution(s) or organisation(s) contributing to the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Cardinality: 1..1, if Resource.contributors.nameType == 'Organisational'; otherwise 0..0 / Additional Information: Group of items applicable only when providing organisational, institutional or group names. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.definition: Contributor type an organisation, institution or group fulfills. For example, this can be a sponsor of the study or a group of authors of the document.
element.comment: Short Input Help: Which contributor type does the organisation, institution or group fulfill? Select one value from the list. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1], CT.gov [2], DRKS [3]

element.definition: Identifier(s) assigned by a funder to the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Cardinality: 0..*, if Resource.contributors.organisational.type == ('Funder (public)' OR 'Funder (private)'); otherwise 0..0 / Short Input Help: If available, you can enter funding identifiers. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health, DataCite [1], CT.gov [2]

element.definition: Name of the organisation, institution or group.
element.comment: Short Input Help: An organisational name can be used to denote a research group or an institution. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health, DataCite [1], DataCite [1], CT.gov [2], DRKS [3]

element.definition: Group of items providing information about person(s) contributing to the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Cardinality: 1..1, if Resource.contributors.nameType == 'Personal'; otherwise 0..0 / Additional Information: Group of items applicable only when providing person names. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.definition: Contributor type a person fulfills. For example, this can be a principal investigator of a study or an author of a document.
element.comment: Short Input Help: Which contributor type does the person fulfill? Select one value from the list. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1], CT.gov [2], DRKS [3]

element.definition: Given name of the person.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1], CT.gov [2], DRKS [3]

element.definition: Family name(s) of the person.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1], CT.gov [2], DRKS [3]

element.definition: Group of items providing information about digital identifiers of the person.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.definition: Digital identifier according to a specific scheme that uniquely identifies the person.
element.comment: Short Input Help: Preferably, provide an ORCID (https://orcid.org/). / Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1]

element.definition: Type of the identifier scheme reported.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1]

element.definition: Email address of the  person, group of persons or institution/organisation.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: CT.gov [2], DRKS [3]

element.definition: Phone number of the  person, group of persons or institution/organisation.
element.comment: Short Input Help: Please use the International ITU-T E.164-number structure for geographic areas. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: CT.gov [2], DRKS [3]

element.definition: Group of items providing further information about the organisation(s) associated with the contributor.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.definition: Name of the organisation associated with the contributor.
element.comment: Short Input Help: If you have already entered the name of the organistion in the field 'Name of the organisation/institution/group', please repeat it here. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite[1], CT.gov [2], DRKS [3], NFDI4Health

element.definition: Address of the organisation associated with the contributor.
element.comment: Short Input Help: Please preferably use the following address format: Street name and number [comma] post code [comma] city [comma] country. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: CT.gov [2], DRKS [3], NFDI4Health

example.label: Example of an address of a contributor

element.definition: Web page of the organisation associated with the contributor.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: DRKS [3]

element.definition: Group of items providing information about identifiers of the organisation.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.definition: Digital identifier according to a specific scheme that uniquely identifies the organisation.
element.comment: Short Input Help: Preferably, provide an identifier from ROR (https://ror.org/search). / Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1]

element.definition: Type of the identifier scheme reported.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1]

element.definition: Group of items providing information about identifiers (IDs) assigned to the given [RESOURCE] by another registering systems, e.g. a registry of clinical trials or a data repository.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.definition: Type/name of the system where the given [RESOURCE] is already registered.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.definition: Identifier (ID) assigned to the given [RESOURCE] by another registering system, e.g. by a registry of clinical trials or a data repository.
element.comment: Short Input Help: If the [RESOURCE] is registered in other systems (e.g. a registry of clinical trials or a data repository), you can provide here corresponding identifier(s) such as DRKS00021273, NCT04327505, etc. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health, DataCite [1]

element.definition: Group of items providing information about identifiers (IDs) of the resources related to the given [RESOURCE], e.g. DOIs of publications, datasets, study documents or links to web pages.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.definition: Identifier (ID) related to, or associated with, the [RESOURCE] being registered. These can be IDs of related publications, datasets, study documents, web pages, etc.
element.comment: Additional Information: a) Publications like journal articles usually have a DOI, e.g. 10.3238/arztebl.2020.0861. b) A link (URL) starting with 'http(s)://' to a web page with any additional information can also be provided. / Short Input Help: If existing, you can specify here identifier(s) of any related resources, e.g. DOIs of publications, datasets, study documents, links to web pages, etc. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1]

element.definition: Type of the identifier of the related resource.
element.comment: Short Input Help: Select one value from the list. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1]

element.short: Relationship between this [RESOURCE] (A) and the related resource (B)
element.definition: Relationship between the [RESOURCE] being registered (A) and the related resource (B).
element.comment: Short Input Help: Select one value from the list. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1]

example.label: Example of a relationship between two resources

element.definition: Type of the related resource, e.g. journal article, dataset, text, etc.
element.comment: Short Input Help: Select one value from the list./ Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1]

example.label: Example of a related resource type

element.short: Related resources registered on this portal
element.definition: Group of items providing information about related resources (e.g. (sub-)studies, study documents, etc.) registered on this portal.
element.comment: Additional Information: Does the [RESOURCE] have any related resources registered on this portal? / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.definition: Identifier (ID) of the related resource assigned on this portal.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

example.label: Example of an Identifier assigned by NFDI4Health

element.definition: Date when the identifier of the related resource was assigned.
element.comment: Additional Information: Preferred date format: DD.MM.YYYY. / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.short: Relationship between this [RESOURCE] (A) and the related resource (B)
element.definition: Relationship between the [RESOURCE] being registered (A) and the related resource (B).
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: DataCite [1]

element.definition: Indication whether the [RESOURCE] collects nutritional data.
element.comment: Cardinality: 1..1, if Resource.classification.type == ('Study' OR 'Substudy') AND Resource.provenance.dataSource == 'Manually collected'; otherwise 0..0 / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.1 requirements

element.definition: Indication whether the [RESOURCE] addresses chronic diseases.
element.comment: Cardinality: 1..1, if Resource.provenance.dataSource == 'Manually collected'; otherwise 0..0 / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.2 requirements

element.definition: Group of items providing information about provenance aspects of the data entry on this portal.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.definition: Source of information about the [RESOURCE] and the way it was uploaded/collected.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health

element.definition: Date on which the responsible party last verified the information about the [RESOURCE], even if no additional or updated information is being submitted.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: CT.gov [2]

element.definition: User who last verified the information about the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: CT.gov [2]

element.definition: Date when the [RESOURCE] was first submitted for publication.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: CT.gov [2]

element.definition: User who first submitted the [RESOURCE] for publication.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: CT.gov [2]

element.definition: Date when the [RESOURCE] was first posted/published.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: CT.gov [2]

element.definition: User who first posted/published the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: CT.gov [2]

element.definition: Date when the last update of the [RESOURCE] was submitted for publication.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: CT.gov [2]

element.definition: User who submitted the last update of the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: CT.gov [2]

element.definition: Date when the last update of the [RESOURCE] was posted/published.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: CT.gov [2]

element.definition: User who posted/published the last update of the [RESOURCE].
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: CT.gov [2]

element.definition: Version number of the [RESOURCE] within this portal.
element.comment: Source of the property and/or allowed values: CT.gov [2]
